note.p: German politician. Of Breslau (now Wrocław, Poland). Studied law in Göttingen, Berlin, and Breslau. Bürgermeister of Breslau until 1879. Member of the Silesian Chamber of Representatives, 1866–76. Member of the Schlesischen Gesellschaft für vaterländische Kultur, 1837; secretary-general, 1845–71; vice-president, 1878.
